# ApiClient.AUTOPLAY_RECEIVE_PORT field

The port to listen for responses from the AutoPlay plugin running in Unity. Due to loopback limitations, this port must be different than the [`AUTOPLAY_DEFAULT_PORT`](./AUTOPLAY_DEFAULT_PORT.md)

```csharp
public static int AUTOPLAY_RECEIVE_PORT;
```
